description: Comprehensive Battle for Zendikar mechanics: Devoid, Ingest, Processors, Awaken, Landfall, Rally (Allies), Converge, Eldrazi Scions, exile-matters, colorless matters.

Creature: Rally — Whenever this or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, {ALLY_RALLY}.
Rally — Whenever an Ally enters the battlefield under your control, target creature you control gains vigilance until end of turn.
Rally — Whenever this or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.
Rally — Whenever an Ally enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Ally.
Rally — Whenever an Ally enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card, then discard a card.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, {LANDFALL_SMALL}.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, {LANDFALL_BIG}.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, this gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Converge — This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.
Converge — When this enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast it.
Converge — When this enters the battlefield, exile up to X target cards from graveyards, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast it.
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Instant: Awaken 2 — Put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.
Awaken 3 — Put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance. It's still a land.
Awaken 4 — Put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.
Awaken 5 — Put five +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control this turn, {LANDFALL_SMALL}.
Until end of turn, whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
Converge — {CONVERGE_EFFECT}.
Converge — Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value X or less, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
Converge — Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
Exile target tapped creature.
Sorcery: Awaken 2 — Put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.
Awaken 3 — Put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance. It's still a land.
Awaken 4 — Put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.
Awaken 5 — Put five +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control this turn, {LANDFALL_SMALL}.
Until end of turn, whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
Converge — {CONVERGE_EFFECT}.
Converge — Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value X or less, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
Converge — Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.
Enchantment: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token with "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
Converge — At the beginning of your end step, draw X cards, where X is the number of colors among permanents you control, then discard a card.
Converge — Creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

Each opponent exiles a card from their graveyard.
Exile target creature with mana value 3 or less.
